quote_first:
“Yeah, I was just thinking . . .”
Shan stole a glance at the pendulum wall clock.
quote_last: . Eighteen minutes before he’d be escorted back. “I’m worried I left the drip hose on. If Ranger Roy gets here early, tell him I’ll be back in a few.”
title: The Edge of Lost
author: Kristina McMorris

quote_first: When Black himself finally appeared at
quote_last: , she became very engrossed in the details of Wednesday’s surveillance. So engrossed, in fact, the she barely noticed him standing in the door of her space until he spoke.
title: His Hot Number
author: Shannon Hollis
